import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from "react-router"; import { Card, Icon, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Dialog from '@material-ui/core/Dialog'; import DialogActions from '@material-ui/core/DialogActions'; import DialogContent from '@material-ui/core/DialogContent'; import DialogContentText from '@material-ui/core/DialogContentText'; import DialogTitle from '@material-ui/core/DialogTitle'; import JobAdvertisementService from '../services/JobAdvertisementService' export default function JobAdvertisementDetails() { let { jobAdvertisement_id } = useParams() const [jobAdvertisementDetail, setJobAdvertisementDetail] = useState() useEffect(() => { let jobAdvertisementService = new JobAdvertisementService() jobAdvertisementService.getById(jobAdvertisement_id).then(result => setJobAdvertisementDetail(result.data.data)) }) const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false); const handleClickOpen = () => { setOpen(true); }; const handleClose = () => { setOpen(false); }; return (
{jobAdvertisementDetail ? ((
{jobAdvertisementDetail.employer.companyName} {jobAdvertisementDetail.employer.webSite} {jobAdvertisementDetail.employer.companyEmail} {jobAdvertisementDetail.employer.phoneNumber} {jobAdvertisementDetail.approve ? ( ) :
}
)) : null} Subscribe To subscribe to this website, please enter your email address here. We will send updates occasionally.
) }
